pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Reishi 90ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Used in Traditional Chinese Medicine to replenish Qi, support vitality and maintain healthy immune system function.

Wanderlust Reishi is a consciously created plant active in a readily absorbed liquid herbal extract. Reishi is used in Traditional Chinese Medicine to replenish Qi, support vitality, relieve tiredness, reduce coughing and maintain healthy immune system function.

Size: 90 mL

Warnings

Adults only.

Talk to a TCM practitioner/health professional if you are unsure if this medicine is right for you. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Ingredients

EACH 4.5 mL CONTAINS:
Ganoderma lucidum (Reishi) whole plant ext. liquid 4.05 mL
Derived from dry------2 g

Also contains glycerol and orange oil
Contains 27% alcohol.

No added gluten, dairy, lactose, egg, artificial colours or artificial flavours.
Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

You can expect a bitter taste which is typical of herbal extracts and all of their goodness.

Complemented with natural orange oil.

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
Using the measured dropper take 4.5 mL daily, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Drop directly onto the tongue or dilute in 30 mL of water or juice and consume immediately. Follow with a glass of water if necessary.

Shake well before use.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a cool, dry place away from direct heat and sunlight. Do not use if cap seal is missing or broken.
